mapper.select: select * from tb_user where phone=#{phone} and password=#{password};
select count(*) from tb_user where phone=#{phone};
mapper.update: update tb_user set password=#{password} where phone=#{phone}
mapper.select: select * from tb_user where user_id in (select relative_id from tb_relatives where user_id=#{user_id})
mapper.update: update tb_user set picture_url=#{picture_url} where user_id=#{user_id}
update tb_user set phone=#{phone} where user_id=#{user_id} and password is not null
mapper.select: select distinct concat(area_code,town) as town_id from tb_town where town_name=#{town_name};
select distinct concat(area_code,town) as town_id,town_name from tb_town where area_code in (select area_code from tb_area where area_name=#{area_name});
